- Press `Ctrl+P` â†’ Save as PDF

### ğŸ“½ï¸ Google Slides

## ğŸ› ï¸ How It Works

These scripts work by:
1. Accessing the already-loaded page images in your browser
2. Compiling them into a PDF or saving them as individual images
3. Downloading the result to your computer

**Important:** These methods only work on documents you can already view. They do not bypass any security or access controls.

---

## âš–ï¸ Legal & Ethical Use

- âœ… **Use for:** Personal backups, offline access to your allowed documents
- âŒ **Do NOT use for:** Bypassing security, stealing copyrighted content, unauthorized distribution

Always respect copyright and document ownership rights.
